queryData.query: SELECT (select count(ID) from TransactionsHistory where isSCAApplied =1) as scaCount, (select count(ID) from TransactionsHistory where isSCAApplied =1 and isFraud = 1) as scaFraudCount,(select round(sum(amount), 2) from TransactionsHistory where isSCAApplied =1) as scaAmount, (select count(ID) from TransactionsHistory where isSCAApplied =0) as exemptCount, (select count(ID) from TransactionsHistory where isSCAApplied =0 and isFraud = 1) as exemptFraudCount,  (select round(sum(amount), 2) from TransactionsHistory where isSCAApplied =0) as exemptAmount FROM openbank_tra_db.TransactionsHistory limit 1 #
